newsitem.title: COTE D'IVOIRE: AfDB gives Ghana salt mill $825,000 loan.
newsitem.headline: AfDB gives Ghana salt mill $825,000 loan.

text.p: The African Development Bank (AfDB) said on Tuesday it had given Eldin Salt Mill Limited (ESML) of Ghana a loan of $825,000 through its private sector window to help it expand existing operations.
According to ESML chairman Nour Captan, the seven-year loan will help fund a $1.65 million expansion, which will enable it to increase the volume of coarse salt exports and create jobs.

In an AfDB statement Cyril Enweze, vice-president in charge of operations for the development bank, praised Ghana as a country that had made a big effort to enable private sector enterprises to thrive.
